Title: Sharpay's Fabulous Adventure
Genre: Comedy, Drama, Family, Music, Musical, Romance
Writer: Robert Horn, Peter Barsocchini (based on: characters created for "High School Musical" by)
Actors: Ashley Tisdale, Austin Butler, Cameron Goodman, Bradley Steven Perry
Plot: Sharpay Evans travels to New York where she is pursuing a Broadway career but it's her dog who lands an acting gig first.
